synopsis.text: Ayaâ€™s manga isn't selling, and college student Kazuki Sendou, once reluctant, is now a dedicated doujinshi artist with a passion for the craft. Inspired by the earnestness of his friends and fellow artists, Kazuki sets out to help Aya and rekindle his own love for drawing. As he becomes more involved in the world of fan comics, Kazuki's relationships with his childhood friend Mizuki and his classmate Taishi begin to change. With new friends and a shared dream, Kazuki embarks on a journey to create and publish his own art in the thriving doujinshi community. Based on the Dreamcast/PC game "Comic Party," this series follows Kazuki and his friends as they navigate the challenges and triumphs of the fan comic world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
